Title: Salvage
Writer: Ty Franck (based on the novels by), Daniel Abraham (based on the novels by), Mark Fergus (developed by), Hawk Ostby (developed by), Robin Veith (written for television by)
Actors: Thomas Jane, Steven Strait, Cas Anvar, Dominique Tipper
Plot: A derelict vessel holds a potentially devastating secret. Holden and his crew cross paths with Miller on Eros. Avasarala receives bad news.
